constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素权重和不超过容量上限（卡车油箱容量限制）

constraints.name: reachability_constraint
constraints.description: 从起点到终点的路径必须存在且满足条件（FJ 必须能够到达目的地）
constraints.formal: exists path from 0 to D such that sum(weights) <= G and cost is minimized

constraints.name: initial_fuel_constraint
constraints.description: 初始状态下的资源量限制（初始燃油量限制）
